thread.title: Top Tourist Attractions In Denver That Should Not Be Missed
thread.title_full: Top Tourist Attractions In Denver That Should Not Be Missed

author: admin
title: Top Tourist Attractions In Denver That Should Not Be Missed
text:
Home > Travel Destinations > Top Tourist Attractions In Denver That Should Not Be Missed Top Tourist Attractions In Denver That Should Not Be Missed   24, 2015 Pin It 
Denver serves as the capital of Colorado. This American metropolis showcases the Old West era with Larimer Square, its oldest block, featuring 19th century buildings. Top tourist attractions of Denver mainly includes, museums that are known for their collection of indigenous works. 
Denver also serves as the jumping-off point for people who are fond of skiing. It is truly one of the most exciting and desirable cities to visit in America. 5 Top Tourist Attractions In Denver To Visit 
Some of the top tourist attractions in Denver that should not missed during your visit are as follows: Red Rocks Park Photo Credits: Corey Thompson 
This park is located at a distance of 15 miles west from Denver and hosts several outdoor concerts during summer. It is the natural atmosphere of the park that attracts visitors who come here for a great musical experience. The park also features a number of hiking trails. Denver Museum Of Nature and Science Photo Credits: michaelbwelch 
This museum in Denver provides educational fun for people of almost all ages. Edwin Carter, the Denver naturalist, founded this museum in 1900. At present, the museum accommodates more than one million objects from around the world. 16th Street Mall Photo Credits: Kent Kanouse 
The 16th Street Mall serves as a staple for the locals and a memorable experience for the visitors coming to Denver from throughout the world. It is a 1.25 mile long pedestrian mall at 16th Street in Denver. Evenings and afternoons are the best time to visit the mall. You can find a perfect blend of both high class and budget shopping along with fabulous dining. Denver Zoo 
This is one of the must-see attractions in Denver. The zoo serves as a home to more than 4000 animals and even some endangered species. This zoo was actually started with an orphaned American Black Bear gift to mayor of Denver. Denver Botanic Gardens Photo Credits: Keith 
Denver Botanic gardens accommodate more than 32000 varieties of plants. The garden is both beautiful and educational and is truly one of the top tourist attractions in Denver. You can find a conservatory, theme gardens, and an amphitheater. Various concerts are hosted at this amphitheater during summer.
